data.name: Judgment: Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Judgment: Apocalypse Survival Simulation soundtrack by Alon Kaplan. Including 19 minutes of music in 9 different tracks. All tracks are recorded in high-quality mp3 format.

Once purchased, files will be located in a "Soundtrack" directory in the game's installation folder, and will be automatically added to Steam's media player. Read here for more information.
